details:
verb
- struggle for breath
= synonyms: choke
- constrict (someone's) throat and keep from breathing
= synonyms: choke
- prevent the progress or free movement of
= synonyms: halter
- die from strangulation
- conceal or hide
= synonyms: stifle
- kill by squeezing the throat of so as to cut off the air
= example: kill by squeezing the throat of so as to cut off the air
= synonyms: throttle
